data: Baseline pre infusion. Monitor blood pressure, heart rate, respiratory rate and temperature q15min until infusion complete.
Use Dove soap and apply dermabase cream to entire body qdaily

PLACEHOLDER: Administer Hematopoietic Stem Cells IV, Fresh, Adminster over: 4 hours.  A RN must be present and in the room during infusion. Administer via gravity. Source: Marrow/Peripheral Blood, Cord Blood
